text: <@UPMUFSGCR> Might not be relevant, but I had a problem a couple of years ago when 1 in 3 of my stream connections were failing. At the time I was using a server in the Netherlands. Managed to track it down to specific servers at the Betfair end (from the connection IDs) and it turned out to be a failing process at the Betfair end, failing to properly replicate acceptable IP addresses to some new validation servers. Once identified they were very quick to sort it out.

elements.text: Might not be relevant, but I had a problem a couple of years ago when 1 in 3 of my stream connections were failing. At the time I was using a server in the Netherlands. Once identified they were very quick to sort it out.

text: Thanks Peter. I just hope Betfair can sort it out tomorrow, as my stuff is such a mess that it'll be hard to recover that bot.

user_profile.real_name: Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon Jon
user_profile.name: fcmisc
